abort.account_updated: Account updated, please restart Home Assistant

auth.description: Provide username and password to your Yandex account. Should your 2-factor authentication be enabled, provide OTP password from the Yandex.Key app

cookies.description:
1. Install extension for Chrome/Edge/Opera (and other WebKit browsers): [Copy Cookies](https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/copy-cookies/jcbpglbplpblnagieibnemmkiamekcdg)
2. Authenticate at [Yandex Passport.com](https://passport.yandex.com/profile)
3. Paste Cookies collected by the extension in the field below

token.description: You can transfer your token from another Home Assistant installation. Token is obtained from the `/config/.storage/core.config_entries` file. There are no other ways to copy this token.

external.description:
1. Authorize via [external URL]({external_url})
2. Continue authentication with this component

You are required to be behind the same external IP as your Home Assistant installation; employ other means of authentication otherwise.
